title.english: Bleach the Movie: Memories of Nobody

description:
In Karakura Town, there has been a sudden outbreak of unidentifiable spirits called "blanks" (vacant souls) while in the skies of Soul Society, the real world has been reflected. A mysterious female shinigami called Senna has appeared before Ichigo along with a man named Ganryu, leading a group called the "Dark Ones."

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/WendeeLeeVO)

Wendee Lee is an American voice actress and one of the most prolific and experienced American voice actors in the business. While she has done voicework for many video games, as well as several episodes in the Power Rangers franchise, she is particularly prolific in the dubbing of anime, where she has more credits than any other English anime voice actor with currently two hundred and fourteen credits.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ShiroSAGISU_twi)

__Non-Anime Credits:__ 
- Music composer for ''Neon Genesis Evangelion'' (N64, VG) (Japanese) 
- Music composer for ''Shining Force Neo'' (VG)
- Music composer for ''Attack on Titan (live-action movie)''
- Music composer for'' Attack on Titan II: End of the World (live-action movie)''
- Music composer for ''Shin Godzilla''
- Music composer for ''Shin Ultraman''

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/imozuka) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%9F%B3%E9%87%8E%E8%81%A1)

Satoshi Ishino is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, character/mechanical designer and animation director.

He started working at Studio Giants, but later went to work at Studio Fantasia before becoming a freelance animator. Today he is a part of the animator group Studio Hercules (スタジオへらくれす), and he's also a part of the doujin circle TEAM Imozuka (TEAM いもずか).

Satoshi is best known for his work as a character designer and animation supervisor in the show Excel Saga and the related Puni Puni Poemi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kudo_M_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kudo_m_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVcxdd04vCuhr-1t7mDh3gg)

Originating from [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/). Most known for his work on the [Bleach](https://anilist.co/anime/269/) franchise.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kudo_M_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kudo_m_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVcxdd04vCuhr-1t7mDh3gg)

Originating from [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/). Most known for his work on the [Bleach](https://anilist.co/anime/269/) franchise.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

The band formed in 2000 after two of the original members met on the internet and discovered that they attended the same university. At their formation with all their current members in 2003, the band's name was Aqua Times, the correct spelling of their current name. No major releases came from the band during this period. The band renamed themselves to Aqua Timez in 2005. Their first release under this name was Sora Ippai ni Kanaderu Inori, a mini-album which charted well on the Oricon.  (Source: Wikipedia)
**Shimizu Tomoyuki (清水友幸)** is a Japanese art director and background artist.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大西雅也)

Long-time key member of [Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/studio/1/). Married to [Takako Oonishi](https://anilist.co/staff/139180/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大西雅也)

Long-time key member of [Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/studio/1/). Married to [Takako Oonishi](https://anilist.co/staff/139180/).

Singer from the UK. During her career, she has worked with such artists as Jamiroquai, Kylie Minogue, Massive Attack, Tom Jones, Céline Dion, Tina Turner, Robbie Williams, Stereophonics and many more. She has also performed on film soundtracks and in musicals, taking the lead in Notre Dame de Paris as Esmeralda in London's West End and playing the part of Mary Magdalene in the Jesus Christ Superstar UK tour.

title.native: 劇場版 NARUTO -ナルト- 大激突!幻の地底遺跡だってばよ
